Title: Parental Control System
Description:
The ParentalShield is multithreading and multiuser parental control system, which allows you to define what can be run and when, the Web Sites that may or not be visited and the words that should be blocked in searches and urlâ€™s. As well, for how long the user can use the computer.

All the information is saved locally and encrypted (with a generated local key, that is unique by installation), for better protection of the sensitive data.

No personal data is transmitted over the internet.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The ParentalShield is multithreading and multiuser parental control system, which allows you to define what can be run and when, the Web Sites that may or not be visited and the words that should be blocked in searches and url’s. As well, for how long the user can use the computer.

All the information is saved locally and encrypted (with a generated local key, that is unique by installation), for better protection of the sensitive data.

No personal data is transmitted over the internet.
